restaurant_review: Makan sushi disini emang paling enak. Walaupun modelnya gak aneh2 kyk sushi lain. tapi rasanya semua pas. ukurannya jg pas. So Recomended !Why ?1. Hampir semua sushinya enak2. Beragam menu sushinya3. Pelayanan yang baik sekaliNay?1. Harga yang semakin mahal.Overall aku lebih suka makan sushi disini dibandingkan sushi cantik lainnya yang rasanya gak karuan.
Food - summary: Almost all sushi is delicious, with a variety of menu options and perfectly sized portions.
Price - summary: The prices are continuously increasing, which is a concern.

restaurant_review: Yuhuu Balik lagi ke People Cafe. People Cafe yang gue kunjungi kali ini letaknya ada di setiabudi one lantai dasar. Gue dateng ke sini tujuannya buat buka puasa sekaligus makan malem. Di sini tempatnya lebih luas daripada outletnya yang di central park. Style interiornya sih sama aja kayak cabang2 lainnya. Dan yang bikin gue seneng ke sini adalah wifinya yang lumayan kenceng dan banyak stop kontak. Untuk menunya, gue gak perlu describe secara detail lah yaa. Secara restoran ini sudah cukup populer, so gue hanya akan bahas menu2 yang gue pesen aja. Salted Egg Chicken (IDR 50K) Lagi2 menu ini yang gue pesen. Hahaha habis gimana lagi, menu ini buat gue yang paling enak dan salah satu favorit juga di sini. Menu ini terdiri dari semangkuk nasi putih pulen, ayam goreng yang dilumuri saus telor asin, telor ceplok, dan daun salam koja yang gurih. Untuk rasanya menurut gua seperti biasa, enak banget. Saus telur asinnya cukup tasty, lumayan nendang dan konsistensinya bagus. Lalu nasinya bener2 pulen, daun salamnya lumayan memberi textur, dan ayamnya super duperrr gurih. Untuk telor ceploknya buat gue juga lumayan enak, matengnya pas, dan seasoningnya pas. Overall untuk menu ini, GOOD! Overall sih gue masih puas dengan people's cafe. Gue jarang dapet pengalaman yang gak memuaskan di restoran ini. DAri segi pelayanan sih udah pasti ramah dan tanggap, karena ismaya restoran juga mengutamakan service yang memuaskan. Dateng lagi? Pasti.
Ambience - summary: The interior style is similar to other branches, and the restaurant is larger than the Central Park outlet. The WiFi is quite strong and has many Wi-Fi hotspots, which is a positive aspect for guests.
Food - summary: The Salted Egg Chicken (IDR 50K) is a favorite dish, consisting of fluffy white rice, crispy fried chicken marinated in salty egg sauce, a soft-boiled egg, and fragrant koja leaves. The sauce is tasty and bold with good consistency, the rice is very fluffy, the leaves add texture, and the chicken is extremely delicious and crispy. The soft-boiled egg is well-cooked and seasoned properly. Overall, the dish is excellent.
Service - summary: The staff are friendly and responsive, and the restaurant consistently prioritizes satisfactory service.

restaurant_review: Kesini waktu weekend dan kebetulan Timnas lagi main. Jujur pilih cafe ini karena suasananya cozy dan memfasilitasi buat nobar, secara tvnya aja ada 4, proyektor besar 1, akhirnya ga pake mikir langsung cus masuk ini cafe.Cara pesannya kita scan barcode, pesan menu via aplikasi, dan klik order via aplikasi. Untuk menu ga terlalu banyak pilihan sih, untuk menu set nasinya (lupa namanya) ini enak sih, dagingnya juicy banget, porsinya mengenyangkan. Untuk pizzanya menurutku kok biasa aja ya, padahal dari namanya kan nonjolin menu pizza kan harusnya tapi menurutku malah enakan set nasinya itu sih. Kalau pizza, toppingnya juga sedikit, harganya agak pricey, atau bisa juga karena aku aja yg salah pilih menu ya btw heheh
Ambience - summary: The cafe has a cozy atmosphere and is well-suited for watching games, with four TVs and a large projector, making it ideal for group gatherings or watching Timnas matches during weekends.
Food - summary: The nasi set is delicious with juicy meat and a satisfying portion. The pizza is average, with minimal toppings, and does not live up to the expectation of being a 'non-jolong' (non-ordinary) pizza.
Price - summary: The pizza is considered pricey, though the reviewer suggests it might be due to personal choice in menu selection.

restaurant_review: Kebetulan lg laper banget dan liat di salah satu delivery online ada chicken salted egg nya the people's cafe, penasaran dong, akhirnya pesen karena harganya cuman 25k.Pas dateng ternyata gede guys, aku kira bakal kecil gtu tp ternyata engga dan porsinya cukup buat makan siang sih, diluar ekspektasi untuk harganya walau by online delivery ya.Untuk rasa sendiri buat aku oke dan ga ada masalah, rasanya enak dan gurih, dagingnya jg gede gede dan uniknya dikasih telur dadar. Buat aku telur dadarnya sedikit agak asin tp tetap enak klo pake nasi.Mungkin akan order lg next
Food - summary: The chicken salted egg is tasty and delicious with a good flavor. The meat is large and unique as it comes with a fried egg. The fried egg is slightly salty but still enjoyable when served with rice.
Price - summary: The price is only 25,000, which is reasonable, and the portion is sufficient for a lunch meal, exceeding expectations for the price despite being delivered online.

restaurant_review: nyobain menu baru Taco Sushi. Saya pesan : *Salmon Aburi Taco Sushi (38k++)  crispy nori dengan isian sushi rice yang enak + salmon aburi dengan dynamite & teriyaki teriyaki sauce. Ukuran taco sushi ini cukup besar, enak dan cukup mengenyangkan juga. Menu taco sushi ini super crunchy sampe pas kamu gigit norinya beneran bunyi kriuk2. Enak deh, ada sensasi menikmati makanan dengan cara yang agak berbeda. Recommended. *Tempura Taco Sushi (28k++)  crispy nori dengan filling sushi rice, fried tempura dan red cabbages toppingnya mayo dan chili sauce. Sama dengan varian yang sebelumnya. Norinya crispy, tempuranya juga enak, tapi saya lebih suka yang Salmon aburi.  *Chicken Teriyaki Teishoku (59k++)  chicken teriyaki set yang dilengkapi dengan nasi, salad, miso soup dan Japanese pickles. Chicken teriyaki ini bagian luarnya crispy dan daging ayamnya empuk dan juicy. Miso soup dan saladnya enak. Semuanya enak, recommended.Ada beberapa varian Taco Sushi lainnya yang bisa di coba di Sushi Groove. Saya masih penasaran next time pasti akan balik lagi ke sini untuk mencoba.
Food - summary: The Salmon Aburi Taco Sushi features crispy nori with delicious sushi rice and salmon aburi, served with dynamite and teriyaki sauce. The taco is large, satisfying, and has a great crunch that makes a cracking sound when bitten. The Tempura Taco Sushi includes crispy nori, fried tempura, and red cabbage with mayo and chili sauce, offering a good taste but less preferred compared to the Salmon Aburi version. The Chicken Teriyaki Teishoku includes crispy chicken teriyaki, fluffy rice, salad, miso soup, and Japanese pickles; the chicken is crispy on the outside and juicy inside, with all components being delicious.

restaurant_review: Japanese food galore at Sushi Groove! Udah lama gak berkunjung ke cabang PIM ini, interior dan ambience restorannya udah berubah jadi makin nyaman dan rasa makanannya pun jadi makin enak juga. Besttt!*STARTER:- Tako Karaage (IDR 39,000)Deep fried Baby Octopus in Spicy Teriyaki Sauce. Baru sekali ini makan Baby Octopus yang digoreng, dan ternyata enak loh! Didukung dengan rasa Spicy Teriyaki Sauce yang manis pedes gurih!- Chicken Gyoza (IDR 25,000)Deep fried Chicken Dumpling yang tasty, dicocol ke Gyoza Saucenya. Yum!- Spicy Edamame (IDR 25,000)Edamame sauteed with Butter, Chili, Garlic, and Shoyu. Enakkk! Rasa pedes asinnya bikin nagih! Appetizer terrrjuaraaa!*MAINS:- Princess Roll (IDR 69,000)California Roll (Crab Meat, Avocado, and Cucumber) topped with Baked Tuna, Dream Sauce, and Tobiko. Potongannya tebal dan padat, per porsi ada 8 pieces. Super delish!- Mayonnaise Dream Roll (IDR 49,000)Legend! Baked Salmon, Crab, and Carrot roll, topped with Spicy Mayo Sauce and Tobiko. Ini favorit gw dari jaman pertama kali Sushi Groove buka, rasanya gak berubah masih sama enaknya! Recommended!- Krakatau Roll (IDR 33,000 / half portion)Legend! Gindara and Asparagus roll topped with Special Sauce. Favorit gw juga dari jaman dulu! Yummm!- Beef Mozu Bibimbap (IDR 79,000)Sliced Beef, Mozzarella Cheese, Enoki Mushroom, and Egg on a sizzling bed of Fried Rice. Surprisingly DELICIOUS! Berasa banget Fried Ricenya, kering dan berkerak karena dimasaknya di claypot. Slice Beefnya empuk dan juicy, Mozzarella Cheesenya melted, Enokinya lembut, dan Eggnya beleber Kuningnya. Recommended!- Nabeyaki Udon (IDR 69,000)Udon with Braised Chicken, Shrimp Tempura, Shitake Mushroom, and Seaweed. Lagi dan lagi enak! Udonnya super kenyal! Rasa kuahnya manis gurih. So good!- Chicken Katsu Teishoku (IDR 59,000)Japanese meal set which are Gobo Rice, Chicken Katsu, Salad, Miso Soup, and Japanese Pickles. Paket komplit yang mengenyangkan!*DESSERT:- Tiramisu Mochi Ice Cream (IDR 35,000) & Taro Mochi Ice Cream (IDR 35,000)Ice Creamnya berasa banget Tiramisu dan Taronya, Mochinya kenyal.- Cheese Cake (IDR 45,000) & Green Tea Cake (IDR 45,000)Super moist! Rasa Cheese Cakenya manisnya pas dan gak bikin enek, rasa pait Green Teanya dapet banget! LIKEEE!
Ambience - summary: The interior and ambience of the restaurant have been improved and now feel more comfortable.
Food - summary: The food is delicious and well-prepared, with standout items like Tako Karaage, Chicken Gyoza, Spicy Edamame, Princess Roll, Mayonnaise Dream Roll, Krakatau Roll, Beef Mozu Bibimbap, Nabeyaki Udon, and Chicken Katsu Teishoku. Dishes are praised for their taste, texture, and presentation.

restaurant_review: Pesen zaru soba karna pernah nyobain cha soba punya temen dan enak, jd penasaran deh disini rasanya kaya apa. Harganya sekitar 40an kurang lebih. Begitu dtg langsung saya santaaap, duh ini gmn ya gambarin nya, enaaaak deh pokoknya tekstur mie nya kenyal, dingin2 enak gituuu dan kuah celupan nya juara, ah pokoknya saya suka deeeh, pengen lagi ga cukup seporsi huhuhu.
Food - summary: The soba noodles have a chewy texture and are refreshing when cold. The dipping sauce is excellent, and the overall taste is very enjoyable. The reviewer particularly liked the texture of the noodles and the quality of the broth, stating they were satisfied and wanted to visit again.
Price - summary: The price is around 40 thousand rupiah, which the reviewer found reasonable given the quality of the food.

restaurant_review: Salah satu tempat sushi yang si saya suka. Tapi si saya pengen nyoba juga yang selain sushinya terus kabita si gyu tamago don. Rasa dagingnya enak lembut gurih manis khas jepang gitu, telornya juga ga overcooked masih lembut gitu di mulut. Pecah pisan pokonamah rasanya. Favorit si kami juga ini submarine roll. Isinya salmon skin jadi enak lah luarnya creamy isinya crunchy. Enak pisan semuanya. Tuna nigirinya juga si tunanya fresh pisan.
Food - summary: The food is highly praised, especially the gyu tamago don, which has tender, savory, and sweet Japanese flavor with perfectly soft boiled eggs. The submarine roll is also a favorite, featuring salmon skin that adds a creamy texture, while the inside is crunchy and delicious. The tuna nigiri is noted for being fresh.

restaurant_review: Udah lama ga kemari, menu favorite kita disini bimbibapnya!Yang kita pesen tadi : Chicken Curry Bimbibap (69k)- rasanya enak, kita suka ini / kamu bisa pesen mozu beef, kalau kurang pass tambahin aja bumbu yang ada di meja  Soft Shell Inari (2pcs) (35k)- karena kita suka kepiting soka, kita coba menu ini. Ternyataa enakk banget  MUST TRY! Bulgogi Sushi (49k)- dagingnya alot :( kita ga suka sih. HuhuPelayanannya agak lambat yaa, tapi ramah kok.Follow us on IG : FOODTRAVELID
Food - summary: The Chicken Curry Bimbibap is delicious and a favorite dish; the Soft Shell Inari is also very good and recommended as a must-try. However, the Bulgogi Sushi has too much meat and is not to their liking.
Service - summary: The staff are friendly, though the service is a bit slow.

restaurant_review: /GIANT PIZZA E BIRRA/-Review:shock liat ukurannya gede beeeeeeeet! cuman kalo soal rasa menurut #laperberdua kurang gurih dan kurang pizza banget gitu huhu-- @pizzaebirra , Kota Kasablanka 20K - 200K 6,25/10______________________________________#laperberdua #food #foodporn #foodie #foodlover #foodblogger #jktfoodies #jktfoodbang #anakjajan #jajanan #makanan #qraved #zomato #pergikuliner #review #gatakutgenduttt #foodtravelbloggerrr #fooddestination #travel #hangout #pizza #giantpizza #bigpizza
Food - summary: The size of the pizza is impressive, but according to #laperberdua, the taste is not very savory and lacks the authentic pizza flavor.
Price - summary: The price range is between 20K to 200K, which suggests a relatively affordable to mid-range pricing.

restaurant_review: Menu ke-1: banatella (45k)Cobain salah satu dessert mereka. Sebenernya masih pakai base pizza seperti biasa hanya topping di atasnya dengan pisang dan nutella. Pizzanya thin crust, cukup garing di bagian pinggirnya. Sliced banana diiris tipis dan kebetulan pisangnya manis! Nutella disini tidak over dominan jadi masih bisa ngerasain manis alami dari pisang. Menu ke-2: red velvet milkshake (55k) Milkshakenya banyak pilihan, untuk red velvet ga ada yang wow banget cuma enaknya tidak terlalu manis dan masih bisa ngerasain flavour alami dari red velvet. Di bagian atas ada whip cream dan crumble red velvet. Tempatnya luas dan bersih. Waiters sigap dan ramah. Kalau pesan hot tea dapat free refill juga lohh. Ada banyak TV yang menayangkan acara olahraga jadi bisa sambil nobar. Cutlery dibungkus dan diberikan setelah pesan makanan. Prokes disini tergolong oke ya, serta untuk menu sudah scan barcode jadi less touch. Ada free wifi juga. Rating dish: 3.5/5 Rating place: 4/5Rating service: 4/5
Ambience - summary: The place is spacious and clean. There are many TVs showing sports events, making it a good spot to watch games. Free Wi-Fi is also available.
Food - summary: The banana nutella pizza has a thin crust that's crispy at the edges, with thinly sliced sweet bananas and a balanced nutella topping that doesn't overpower the natural sweetness of the banana. The red velvet milkshake is not particularly impressive but is not overly sweet and retains the natural flavor of red velvet, with whipped cream and red velvet crumble on top.
Service - summary: Waiters are prompt and friendly. Customers who order hot tea receive a free refill.

restaurant_review: Cabang terbaru pizza ebirra di mal of indonesia kelapa gading. Tempatnya cukup besar, interiornya colourful and modern. Ada outdoornya yang cukup besar dan nyaman untuk smoking area. Menu yang ditawarkan disini lebih ke modern italian food. Gw pesen beberapa makanan yaitu :- peperoni pizza : pizzanya thin diatasnya ada cheese dan italian style beef peperoni, lumayan sih enak tapi kulit pinggirannya alot jadi agak susah ngunyahnya. - Chicken milanese : chicken breast digoreng dengan tepung panir, disajikan dengan garlic fries dan tartar sauce. Lumayan enak juga, chickennya fresh dan empuk, friesnya sepertinya homemade, rasanya gurih dan enak, tartar saucenya juga lumayan enak. - smash n oreo cheese cake : yang satu ini dessertnya, jadi bentuknya bulet, teksturnya seperti croissant lalu di atasnya dikasi toping cheese dengan potongan oreo, seharusnya ada ice creamnya tapi gw request ice cream dipisah. Enak juga ini. Overall, next time pasti gw kesini lagi karena gw suka dengan tempatnya, cocok banget untuk kongkow malem, apalagi kalau weekend tutupnya jam 12 malem loh.
Ambience - summary: The restaurant has a large space with a colorful and modern interior. It also features a spacious and comfortable outdoor area suitable as a smoking zone.
Food - summary: The peperoni pizza has a thin crust with cheese and Italian-style beef peperoni, which is decently tasty but has a tough edge that makes it hard to bite. The chicken milanese is fresh and tender, served with homemade garlic fries that are crispy and flavorful, and a decent tartar sauce. The smash n oreo cheese cake is enjoyable with a croissant-like texture and cheese topping with oreo pieces; it should have included ice cream, which was requested separately.

restaurant_review: yuhuu guys, hari ini aku lg mampir ke TPC nih yg bercabang di Central Park. jadi hari ini aku order :1. Nasi Goreng Gila2. Cirenguntuk rasa nya semuanya enak ya guys..cocok bgt buat kalian yang ngantoran trus mampir ke TPC buat makan, cucok bgt sih.. karna harganya jg pas buat di kantong karyawann guyss.
Food - summary: The food was delicious, with the Nasi Goreng Gila and Cireng both being well-received. The dishes are suitable for people on the go and offer good taste.
Price - summary: The prices are affordable and suitable for daily workers, making it a cost-effective dining option.

restaurant_review: Pizza e birra salah satu my fav resto to go. But its been a while gak kesana and decided to order via online. Taste nya gak berubah sih! Highly recommended banget makanannyaMust try:1. Meat madness classic crust pizza: Meat addicted must try this! Beef salami, chicken ham, meatballs, and caramelized onion. (8/10)2. Pepperoni regular classic crust: one of my fav! Classic Italian style. Mozzarella with beef pepperoni and drizzled by olive oil. (9/10)3. Salame piccante thin crust pizza: the best!!! Spicy beef salami melted with mozzarella cheese topped with mushrooms perfect combo menurut Aku trus ditaburi oregano and dry chili (10/10)
Food - summary: The food taste remains unchanged and is highly recommended. The Meat Madness Classic Crust Pizza (8/10) features beef salami, chicken ham, meatballs, and caramelized onion. The Pepperoni Regular Classic Crust (9/10) offers a classic Italian style with mozzarella, beef pepperoni, and olive oil. The Salame Piccante Thin Crust Pizza (10/10) is described as the best, with spicy beef salami, melted mozzarella, mushrooms, oregano, and dry chili.

restaurant_review: Dinner disini, ternyata rame juga yaah hampir semua meja smoking dan smoking full, untung saya masih dapet satu meja terakhir yang kosong dibagian dalam pojokan. Mgkn karena disini menunya variatif kali yah, mau yg lokal atau international juga ada dan harganya juga relatif terjangkau. Pesanan saya: Salted egg chicken (50k)Nasi dengan topping ayam goreng tepung yang dicampur salted egg sauce dan telur mata sapi, disajikan dengan kecap asin n rawit terpisah, ini enaak rasanya pas sih sama lidah saya. Cheese lover pizza (55k)Thin crust pizza with mozarella, parmesan and cheddar cheese. Mmhh, rasanya sih so so yaah. Mgkn karena emang gak specialitynya di pizza.
Ambience - summary: The restaurant is quite busy, with almost all tables occupied by smoking guests, and smoking sections are fully booked. Fortunately, the reviewer managed to get a vacant table in a corner interior area.
Food - summary: The salted egg chicken dish was very tasty and well-suited to the reviewer's taste. The dish features fried chicken mixed with salted egg sauce and cow's eye egg, served with separate soy sauce and bird's eye chilies. The cheese lover pizza was described as average, possibly because it is not a specialty item.
Food - sentiment: Positive for salted egg chicken, Neutral for cheese lover pizza
Price - summary: The menu offers a variety of both local and international dishes, and the prices are relatively affordable.

restaurant_review: Potongan ayamnya cukup besar, ada beberapa pilihan sambal aku cobain yang sambal bawang, tepungnya juga enak berbumbu ngga hambarEs merah delimanya juga enak dari jellynya kaya ada isiannya gitu
Food - summary: The chicken portion is quite large, and there are several sambal options. I tried the sambal bawang, which has a good flavor with well-balanced spices. The fried sambal is also delicious, and the red chili jelly has a nice texture with a filling sensation.

restaurant_review: Okay, ke sini karena keliatan ramai terus akhirnya cobain deh. Kesan pertama adalah, pramusaji-nya teges banget kl emg ber2 dikasih tempat 2, kcil, lol. Kl keliatan udh kelar makan, lgs tanpa babibu, diambil deh tu piring / gelas. Jadi rasanya ini bener2 tempat makan, bukan tempat ngbrol / nongkrong. Kebetulan wkt ke sini udh makan berat di tempat lain, jd cuman ngemil doang. Menu-nya banyak varian, harga pun standar lah ga mahal ga murah, porsi-nya sesuai dg harganya. Hohoho. Oiya yg enak di sini bs order setengah porsi, jadi bisa bl dikit2 tp banyak macem Dari gambar menarik nih si tofu, ketika sampai, ampuuun mungil banget!! Rasa biasa aja, nothing more. Oh ini soft tofu ya modelnya, jd lgs lebur tnp dikunyah.Carbonara roll, lumayan enk, pesen yg small, dpt 3 pcs! Ga bgitu kerasa sih keju dan saus carbonara-nya. Tapi seneng aja, soalnya lumayan murah! Utk suasana, di sini padat banget. Jarak antar meja nya relatif sempit. Jadi kl makan di jam crowded, siap2 antara waiting list / berdesak2 ria dg pengunjung lainnya.
Ambience - summary: The atmosphere is crowded with narrow spacing between tables, leading to a busy and potentially crowded environment, especially during peak hours. Customers may face waiting times or physical congestion due to the tight layout.
Food - summary: The food has average taste with nothing special. Soft tofu is soft and melts easily without needing to be chewed, while the carbonara roll is moderately enjoyable with a small portion yielding three pieces. The cheese and sauce are not particularly strong, but the dish is considered reasonably priced.
Price - summary: Prices are standard and reasonable, neither expensive nor cheap. The value is seen as fair given the portion size, and the option to order half portions makes it suitable for light meals or sharing.
Service - summary: The staff are strict, especially in seating—customers are given only one seat if they arrive in pairs, and plates/glasses are taken once meals are finished. This suggests a no-nonsense, restaurant-style service rather than a casual hangout atmosphere.

restaurant_review: Baru tau ada menu baru di Tokyo Belly yang beneran super duper affordable. Harga paket makanannya mulai dari IDR 65k aja & bisa dipesan di Gr*b Food & G*food juga.Kali ini aku nyobain paket Personal Belly. Isinya ada 5 pcs sushi & 1 porsi tori karaage ramen yang bisa dimakan sendiri atau share berdua.BTW, semua menu di sini halal. Jadi aman buat yang muslim.Aku mencoba :1. Tori Karaage RamenRamennya ada 2 pilihan mie; Thin & Slim atau Thick & Curly. Condimentnya ada cabe bubuk, cabe rawit & sejenis saus creamy (?).Aku suka banget kemasannya. Kalau mau makan kuahnya terpisah sama ramen bisa aja, mau digabung pun bisa.Rasa kuahnya beneran nikmat. Rich, gurih dan berasa kaldunya. Dinakan begitu aja udah enak, namun bisa dimakan pakai sedkit cabe maupun bubuk cabai biar lebih pedasBuat mienya aku cobain yang thick & curly. Tingkat kematangannya pas dan telurnya nggak amis. Ayamnya meresap bumbunya, namun tepungnya ga ketebalan. Sesudah dituang sup pun tepungnya nggak lepas & ayamnya empuk.2. California RollSeporsi berisi 5 pca sushi yang lumayan besar namun masih lumayan bite size. Isiannya ada alpukat segar, crabstick, timun & nori.Nasinya pulen dan rasanya nggak hambar, pakai sejenis vinegar gitu. Meski ditap ke kecap, nasinya juga nggak buyar...Overall, recommend banget buat cobain menu bundling yang satu ini. Selain paket ini, ada beberapa paket lain yang bisa dishare bareng keluarga.
Food - summary: The food is highly praised, especially the Tori Karaage Ramen with a rich, savory broth that is flavorful and well-balanced. The thick & curly ramen has perfectly cooked chicken that absorbs the seasoning well, though the batter is not thick enough. The California Roll contains fresh ingredients including avocado, crabstick, cucumber, and nori, with a pleasant vinegar-based sauce that doesn't overpower. The roll is adequately sized and maintains its structure even when paired with soy sauce.
Price - summary: The meal package is described as extremely affordable, starting from IDR 65,000, making it a great value for the quality and quantity of food offered.

restaurant_review: Tempat nya tentu nya sebelahan dengan group mereka. So far dari tempat ok dan pelayanan juga ok.Nah mreka suka ada menu kek happy hour gitu or lunch package. Kebetulan kita cobain yang lunch package. Blackpaper Beef Ramen tapi mie nya bisa pilih mau yang mana. Penasaran cobain yang ijo. So far rasanya sama sih haha tapi ok laah, porsi nya kl menurut kita gak begitu kenyangain
Food - summary: The blackpaper beef ramen has a similar taste regardless of the noodle type chosen, and the portion size was not particularly filling according to the reviewers.
Service - summary: The service was considered okay, as noted in the review.

restaurant_review: Hari ini lagi mampir di grand Indonesia, kebetulan untuk makan malem kita mau cobain the people's cafe. Kita pesen menu:- nasi guyur tikungan: dengan harga 45k exclude PPN sudah dapet nasi goreng dengan kuah gulai yg ditaruh di mangkok secara terpisah, untuk kuah gulainya super gurih dengan ditambah beberapa potongan daging- nasi goreng SEI kecombrang: dengan harga 45k exclude PPN sudah dapet nasi goreng dengan potongan daging sapi dan perpaduan daun kecombrang yang memberikan wangi yang khas
Food - summary: The dishes were well-prepared with flavorful sauces. The nasi guyur tikungan featured a rich, savory gravy served separately with meat pieces, and the nasi goreng SEI kecombrang included beef and a distinct aroma from kecombrang leaves, giving a unique and authentic taste.
Price - summary: Both dishes were priced at 45,000 IDR (excluding PPN), offering good value for the portion and quality of food provided.

restaurant_review: Sushigroove adalah salah satu restaurant sushi yang cukup lama ada di Jakarta dan merupakan salah satu pemain lama. Dengan konsep sushi belt yang berada di 3 outlet mereka yaitu GI, PIM dan Kokas. Kali ini Oppa datang untuk nyobain promo sushi belt mereka.Dengan harga 15 ribu per plate you get the quality of sushi yang more than 15 rbu. Memang tidak sebagus kualitas sushi yang lebih mahal namun untuk harga 15 ribu sushi mereka worth to try. Apalagi ada promo ke jepang dngan makan sushi belt ini yang kalian bisa cek di instagram mereka.Selain itu yang kalian kudu coba disini adalah mochinya mereka yang super love. Aku cobain yang rasa chocolate dan matcha. Not too sweet dan pas aja rasanya.
Food - summary: The sushi quality is more than what you'd expect for 15,000 IDR, though not as premium as more expensive options. The mochi is highly recommended, with chocolate and matcha flavors that are not too sweet and perfectly balanced.
Price - summary: The sushi belt is priced at 15,000 IDR per plate, which offers good value for the quality provided, making it worth trying despite not being as high-end as more expensive sushi.

restaurant_review: Nuker poin 200 buat butter rice ga worth it sih itu dapet 200 poin dapet spending 2jt di grup ismaya  butter rice nya lebih mirip nasi goreng rumahan, untungnya ayamnya enak apalagi ada ssu yang masih runny yolknya. Pizza oreo cheesecake nya terbaik, ga terlalu cheesy manisnya pas. Matcha smoothienya itu produk dari sushi groove tapi sama aja rasanya kayak matcha blended Pelayanannya terbaik sih memang grup ismaya ini sangat helpful dan ga sungkan buat menawarkan bantuan
Food - summary: Butter rice is more like home-style fried rice and not worth the 200 points spent. The chicken is delicious, especially the one with a runny yolk. The Oreo cheesecake pizza is the best, with a balanced sweetness and not overly cheesy. The matcha smoothie tastes similar to a matcha blended drink, even though it's from Sushi Groove.
Price - summary: The butter rice does not justify the 2 million rupiah spending, suggesting the value is low for that dish.
Service - summary: The service is excellent; the staff is helpful and not shy about offering assistance.

restaurant_review: Menghabiskan akhir pekan dengan makan sushi bersama keluarga itu emang jadi hal yang menyenangkan yaaa, kali ini aku makan di Sushi Groove sama keluarga. Aku pribadi pesan Salmon Cheese Roll, Salmon Mentai Roll dan Gyoza Curry Sauce. Sebenarnya masih ada Princess Roll, Krakatau Roll dan menu lain yang aku lupa *lol tapi yang kefoto pun cuma pesananku sendiri aja karena yang lain udah ludes duluan.Salmon mentai roll disini enak, isinya tebal dan saus mentainya sedikit pedas. Gyoza curry sauce menurutku rasanya agak aneh, sebenernya ini aku salah pesan sih hehe mau pesan yang moza tapi malah ke-klik si curry sauce ini. Rasa curry saucenya agak mirip bumbu sate padang, ada irisan cabe rawit juga buat menambah rasa pedas, ngga recommended sih menurutku. Nah kalau Salmon cheese roll menurutku enak banget dan ini jadi favoritku kali ini, kebetulan ini juga pertama kali aku coba sih. isinya ada salmon, cucumber dan cream cheese, di atasnya ada katsuo bushi dan disajikan dengan chilli sauce serta mayo. Sebagai pecinta keju sih menurutku ini ENAK BANGET, salmonnya fresh, ada crunchy dari cucumbernya dan ada rasa gurih asin dari cheesenya, recommended banget dan kayaknya akan jadi menu wajibku kalau ke Sushi Groove.
Food - summary: The Salmon Mentai Roll is delicious with a thick filling and slightly spicy tuna sauce. The Gyoza Curry Sauce has an unusual taste, resembling Padang satay sauce with chili slices, and is not recommended. The Salmon Cheese Roll is highly enjoyable, featuring fresh salmon, cucumber, cream cheese, katsuo bushi, and served with chili sauce and mayonnaise. The combination of fresh salmon, crunchy cucumber, and salty cheese makes it a favorite, and it is strongly recommended as a must-try menu item.

restaurant_review: Ngidam makan nasi ayam gepreknya TPC tapi males banget keluar hotel karena lagi ujan juga, jadi pesen gofood aja dianter sampe lobby. Karena jaraknya cuman 400 meter jadi sampe tempat ku juga masih panas. Enak banget dia punya sambel limonya, pedes asem dan wangi. Ayam gepreknya juga gede, crunchy luarnya tapi tepungnya ga enekin. 1 menu lagi yang ga kefoto ada sandwich yang double cheese gitu. enak juga harus makan panas2 pas cheesenya masih pd melted. semua makanan TPC emang enak2 sih. worthed la buat makan di mall tapi pengen makanan yang indo2 gitu.
Food - summary: The chicken geprek is large with a crunchy exterior and non-offensive coating. The lime sauce is spicy, sour, and fragrant. The double cheese sandwich is also enjoyable, best eaten hot when the cheese is still melted. All TPC food is generally delicious.

restaurant_review: Pesen california roll separoh.. duh cantik bener bentuknya... hahahhaha rasanya sih lumayan.Sama salmon salad wasabi. Ya lumayan juga rasanya unik dan segar.Ocha free refil.Tempat cukup nyaman dan bercolokan. Pegawai sigap dan ga males gerak. Suka deh
Ambience - summary: The place is quite comfortable and has good color contrast.
Food - summary: The California roll was half ordered, but the appearance was nice. The salmon salad with wasabi had a unique and fresh taste.
Service - summary: The staff is prompt and not lazy in moving around.
